participant_1.name: Laura
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, often finds joy in family activities and capturing moments.
participant_1.background: I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better. I enjoy Pinterest for Halloween costume inspiration. I love using my camcorder to film my friends and family. I am a mother. I like to ride horses.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Active and friendly, balances a demanding job with leisure activities and has a playful side.
participant_2.background: I enjoy taking my dog to the farmers market on the weekends. I love the country but enjoy visiting the city life. I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place. I am a police officer who has to run after criminals in my boots, but I still enjoy playing basketball in my free time. I don t like broccoli.

content.text: I am good, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing well! I'm a police officer.
Oh that must be exciting! I'm a mother.
That must be hard work! I'm sure you're great at it.
Thank you! I'm trying my best.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to ride horses and use my camcorder to film my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to take my dog to the farmers market on the weekends.
That sounds like a good time! I love the country. I'm not a big fan of broccoli though.
Same here! I can't stand broccoli.
Yes, I have a dog named Max.
What kind of dog is he?
Oh, that's my favorite kind of dog!
Me too! They're so friendly and lovable.
